page.title: 02ST.MARY'S RECREATION
page.content:
{CLUBS and RECREATION}
{GIGS }(6 oared pilot rowing boats) There are 8 gigs altogether(The Nornour,Serica,Golden Eagle,Bonnet, Czar,Men-a-Vaur,Shah and the Dolphin.) Each gig has a crew of 7 people,a cox and 6 rowers.) {FOOTBALL} Every Sunday 2 football clubs(The Garrison Gunners and the Wallpack Wanderers)These 2 clubs play each other once a week.Occasionally, some grocs or Marines get together and play them. {TENNIS AND SQUASH CLUB} The Tennis court is sigted in an old quarry up the Garrison,next to the Football field.It has trees on three sides,and only on a Easterly wind does it get windy.The Squash court is a single court with a viewing balcony.
